name: As Above So Below v.1
description:
Due to problems with Unity WebGL, the intro cutscene had to be cut from this version of the game. 

As Above So Below is a challenging platformer where you delve down below to face the emptiness. With inspiration from famous platformers like Hollow Knight and Celeste, this game will challenge you who want to experience a beautiful handcrafted world of despair. Will you be up the one who escapes the below? Enter this strange and unexplored world to find out.

This game is not yet finished, we will continue development for a bit longer. Some things currently planned are Better Player Feedback, a more climatic ending, SFX, more polished animations and more polished gameplay feel.

Game by Sofia Lennhager and Abbe Sköld
